title: New: ELOHIM – Skinny Legs
body:
This latest from LA’s **ELOHIM** borders upon trance at points.

With her host of tracks released thus far ranging from out and out pop (She Talks Too Much), to more intimate, sparse offerings, it’s clear that diversity is a real focal point for her. _Skinny Legs_ switches seamlessly from her confessional, almost spoken word delivery to vaguely Burial-esque soundscapes in a heartbeat, making for an engrossing listen. Check it out below.
